Complete all 15 days of the event for a chance to get behind the wheel of THE SUPERCAR!
You only have 15 days to complete all races so don’t forget to check back every day!
New car events will come with future updates. Keep an eye out!

WELCOME TO BROOKLYN!
Enjoy the pleasure of drifting in the streets of Brooklyn, USA.

Minor UI improvements.
Minor bug fixes.

Here’s what’s new:

UPGRADE SYSTEM IS HERE!
Now you can upgrade your cars drift score performance from the upgrades screen.

Minor UI improvements.

See you on the tracks!

Our biggest update yet!
In this update we have everything from new cars to new maps.

Here’s what’s new:
3 new cars!
4 gorgeous new maps!
Night Maps are here! Now you can enjoy drifting at night.
We have reworked the progression in Career Mode and added Capture the Flag mode.
Minor bug fixes.

See you on the tracks!

We're proud to present our new game mode, Capture the Flag!

The objective is to capture all flags before the timer ends. Capturing the active flag unlocks the next flag. Each flag captured gives a time bonus for you to get to the next flag and the game ends when you capture the last flag.

You can try the Capture the Flag mode from the Quick Play menu.

- 11 new languages added!
(Russian, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Malay, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Latin America))
- Daily rewards now refresh after "Day 28".
- Texts in the game are sharper and more readable.
- Graphics settings are now better than ever! From now on, you can choose the recommended settings for your phone to improve your game's performance.
- Wheels now face drift direction while drifting.
- Bug fixes.

- Car XP and Level: Earn XP and level up your selected car based on track score and completed challenges.
- Tuning: As your car levels up, you can tune its performance to 4 different types: Stock, Control, Racing and Pro
- Season 7 – Track 6 is fixed and ready to be completed.
- Suspension is now modified with selected tuning type but not from modification panel.

Konnichiwa! Japanese language option has arrived!

Tire Mechanic: You won’t lose any tires while racing when you hire him!

Modification Card Packs: Car and modification card packs are ready in the store for you to buy any car you like and modify it in any fashion.

Now the cones are in groups for you to smash them together.

The time before you lose your drift has been increased in Perfect Drift maps for a smoother drifting experience.
- Bug fixes.

- As part of our commitment to your right to privacy, we've complied with the new GDPR rules.
- We have a new leaderboard! Now you can see your rank among other PRO drifters.
- Bug fixes.

- You've asked for it and we've delivered. The tutorial is here folks.
Now with every fresh install you can play the tutorial to learn the basics of drifting.
- Minor bug fixes.
- Bug fixes

The long awaited cross-platform MULTIPLAYER is here at last! Choose between 2 different multiplayer modes, Classic Drift or Racing and dominate the leaderboards! Lunar New Year festivities are here as well! Don't forget to check out our new Lunar New Year decals and sales at the store. Now you can do Daily Objectives for amazing rewards! Check out the Daily Objectives in the main menu.
